alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 8:50AM PST until December 25 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Less than a tenth of an inch of ice expected. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Cascades, Klamath Basin and Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County. This includes on and along highway 97, and highways 58 and 31 near highway 97 North of Chiloquin. This includes the communities of Chiloquin, Chemult, and Crescent. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County; South Central Oregon Cascades
